title: T-Minus 24 Days: Uh oh!
body: I forgot to write a post last night! Sorry about that. I knew it would happen eventually, and it may very well happen again, but I'll try my hardest to stay on track. I was pretty bummed last night because the Cardinals lost a huge game, and we had a slow night at the theater. Double whammy. Hopefully tonight's post (two in one day!) will be more exciting than this little turd.
author: Dan
